successes.title: The Culture High
successes.description: The HIGHLY anticipated follow up film to the cult classic documentary The Union: The Business Behind Getting High

Pledges.description: If you were out with any of our crew & would buy us a beer, this pledge would be the equivalent only we don't receive any of the calories or liver damage and you receive our sincerest thanks.
We will give you a HUGE hug next time we see you, PLUS our sincerest thanks
Online "Thank You" credit on The Culture High website, plus the above.
Digital download version of the film, so you can watch the film on all of your social media devices and a "Thank You" credit in the film. (Value Pack)
DVD copy of The Culture High, when the DVD is commercially available, this keeps our distributor happy and a "Thank You" credit in the film. (Add $5 for international shipping)
SIGNED DVD copy of The Culture High DVD and a "Thank You" credit in the end credits of the film.
Can you say BLUE RAY! Blue Ray copy of The Culture High signed by the crew and a "Thank You" credit at the end credits of the film (Add $5 for international shipping)

A "SPECIAL THANKS" credit in the film, larger a more pronounced in the film credits to let everyone know YOU were a key part of bringing The Culture High to the big screen. Plus a signed DVD copy and digital download of the film.

Full size movie poster signed by the crew, along with a limited behind the scenes still photos also signed by the crew. Plus a DVD copy & digital download of the film as well as the "Thank You" credit in the film.

Custom limited edition Culture High T-shirt designed and made only for Kickstarter pledgers (nice one too, American apparel, not some cheap shirt) Plus a signed DVD & digital copy of the film along with the "Thank You" credit in the film.

We will make a personalized thank you video & post it on our Facebook page letting the world know that YOU or YOUR company helped bring THE CULTURE HIGH to the big screen (We personally luv you) Plus a signed DVD & digital copy of the film along with the "Thank You" credit in the film.

A VERY SPECIAL "THANK YOU" credit in the film, this credit will be listed in a separate category, larger in size and limited to only 20 people. This credit will be CLEARY more visible  than the other "Thank You" credits, demonstrating to everyone the amazing support you showed to help bring The Culture High to the big screen all over the nation, plus all of the above.

2 Tickets to the red carpet world premi√®re of the film where ever it may be, plus an associate producer credit in the film along with a personal phone call from producer thanking you for bringing The Culture High to the big screen. Plus all of the above

Some of the cast & crew will host a theatrical screening in YOUR own hometown. We will really make it a great Red Carpet event and let everyone know that YOU are the star that helped bring this film to the big screen, and you will get to keep the ticket sales. PLUS, a framed limited addition poster (Only 8 of these posters will ever be made) signed by the crew and you will get to have dinner with Producer Adam Scorgie AND you will receive a Co-Executive producer credit in the film (Only three Americans or residents other than Canadians, this is for tax credit purposes so get those first two slots while there available) Plus all of the above
